Key Match Events: The Chicago Bulls hit 25 threes in the game against the Memphis Grizzlies.
Post-Match Reflections: Tony Allen discusses the Grizzlies 126-123 loss to the Chicago Bulls, pointing out who was at fault and why the Bulls were successful in the second half.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies' loss to the Bulls was a key topic of discussion on the Chris Vernon Show, with Tony Allen joining the show to break down the game.
Others: The show also covered other news, including Rudy Gay's retirement announcement and a film session with Tony Allen.
